validateTable.description: Check if a table exists in the schema

drizzlePattern.template: SELECT table_name FROM information_schema.tables WHERE table_schema = $1 AND table_name = $2

validateTable.securityNotes: Uses parameterized query - safe from SQL injection

validateColumn.description: Check if a column exists in a table

drizzlePattern.template: SELECT column_name FROM information_schema.columns WHERE table_schema = $1 AND table_name = $2 AND column_name = $3

validateColumn.securityNotes: Uses parameterized query - safe from SQL injection

listTables.description: Get all tables in the schema

drizzlePattern.template: SELECT table_name FROM information_schema.tables WHERE table_schema = $1 ORDER BY table_name

listTables.securityNotes: Uses parameterized query - safe from SQL injection

getTableSchema.description: Get detailed schema information for a table

drizzlePattern.template: SELECT column_name, data_type, is_nullable, column_default, character_maximum_length FROM information_schema.columns WHERE table_schema = $1 AND table_name = $2 ORDER BY ordinal_position

getTableSchema.securityNotes: Uses parameterized query - safe from SQL injection

createTable.description: Create a new table - use Drizzle schema builder
createTable.securityNotes: Use Drizzle schema builder - identifiers are automatically escaped

dropTable.securityNotes: Uses sql.identifier() for safe identifier escaping

addColumn.description: Add a new column to a table
addColumn.securityNotes: Uses sql.identifier() for table/column names, dataType validated against enum

dropColumn.description: Drop a column from a table
dropColumn.securityNotes: Uses sql.identifier() for safe identifier escaping

listIndexes.description: List all indexes for a table

drizzlePattern.template: SELECT i.relname as indexname, ix.indisprimary, ix.indisunique, am.amname, pg_get_indexdef(ix.indexrelid) as indexdef FROM pg_class t JOIN pg_index ix ON t.oid = ix.indrelid JOIN pg_class i ON i.oid = ix.indexrelid JOIN pg_am am ON i.relam = am.oid WHERE t.relkind = 'r' AND t.relname = $1 AND t.relnamespace = (SELECT oid FROM pg_namespace WHERE nspname = $2) ORDER BY i.relname

listIndexes.securityNotes: Uses parameterized query - safe from SQL injection

createIndex.description: Create an index on a table
createIndex.securityNotes: Uses sql.identifier() for names, indexType validated against enum

dropIndex.securityNotes: Uses sql.identifier() for safe identifier escaping

listConstraints.description: List all constraints for a table

drizzlePattern.template: SELECT tc.constraint_name, tc.constraint_type, STRING_AGG(kcu.column_name, ', ') as columns, cc.check_clause FROM information_schema.table_constraints tc LEFT JOIN information_schema.key_column_usage kcu ON tc.constraint_name = kcu.constraint_name AND tc.table_schema = kcu.table_schema LEFT JOIN information_schema.check_constraints cc ON tc.constraint_name = cc.constraint_name WHERE tc.table_schema = $1 AND tc.table_name = $2 GROUP BY tc.constraint_name, tc.constraint_type, cc.check_clause

listConstraints.securityNotes: Uses parameterized query - safe from SQL injection

addConstraint.description: Add a constraint to a table
addConstraint.securityNotes: Uses sql.identifier() for names. Definition must be validated by caller.

dropConstraint.description: Drop a constraint from a table
dropConstraint.securityNotes: Uses sql.identifier() for safe identifier escaping
